review: After weeks of evaluating and using Amazon Fire TV, I have decided I can live without cable in the process save money.  I won't have to watch the "hate channels" like FOX NEWs, MSNBC, etc.  There are plenty of other news programs without the hate.  Also lots of free movies, documentaries and TV shows that I can see on demand.  I have downloaded other apps like NETFLIX, Crackle, Showtime, etc.  Some require a low subscription price and others are free.  Love it!  I am doing this out of principal since I am tired of the high cable price ripoff of the consumer.
